ja479:4.3: Pathaviyā nābhiyaṃ → puthuviyā ayaṃ (bj); paṭhaviyā ayaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); puthaviyā'yaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja479:4.4: sutaṃ mante mahārāja → sutaṃ mahārāja (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja479:7.1: Abhijāto nāgo → abhijāto te nāgo (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja479:8.4: yathimassidaṃ → yathā idaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja479:8.1: Taṃ → taṃ vacanaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | kāliṅgaṃ → kāliṅgo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); kaliṅga (pts-vp-pli1)
ja479:15.1: Mahayitvā sambodhiṃ → mahāyitvāna sambodhiṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1); pahaṃsitvāna sambodhiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); mamāyitvāna taṃ bodhiṃ (mr)
ja479:15.4: Atha rājā manupāyāsi → pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi (si); pākāraparikkhepaṃ kāresi. atha rājā pāyāsi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
